About

Hello, my name is Kristoffer Hernandez. I took STAT130 Survey Analysis Fall 2021 and was inspired to use what I learned to create and analyze a survey of my own.

To begin, I used Python to scrape all professor/lecturer information from profiles.ucr.edu. I cleaned up the data and performed a stratified random sample to select using colleges as clusters (BCOE,CNAS,CHASS,etc.). I didn't know HTML & CSS at the time so I learned the basics of web development over winter break and have now completed my first website!

In the future, I plan to do some analysis on the data using R and put the graphs and learned information on this same website.

Thank you for taking the time to complete my survey!
